item.title: Implementing ML algorithms from scratch
item.description: To further improve upon my knowledge on ML algorithms, I’m trying to implement popular algorithms from scratch only using NumPy. Even though the world is moving towards LLMs, Rags and Langchain I belive that having a strong foundation would really help in understanding these advanced algorithms better. You can find my progress in this repository and I’d welcome any feedback!

item.title: Hello thereðŸ‘‹
item.description: I’m Dhanush Kumar Shankar from Boston Massachusetts. I have completed my Master’s degree in Information Systems from Northeastern University. I’m trying to catch up with the current advancements in AI, and this has been quite interesting but pretty challenging. My areas of interest and my speciality lies in Natural Language Processing (NLP). I have worked as a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at Standard Chareted Bank in India for nearly 2.
